title: How to Subscribe to Peacock With DIRECTV: Complete Guide

steps.title: Cancel any existing subscription.
steps.content: Cancel any existing subscription. Before you can subscribe to Peacock through DIRECTV, you must cancel your existing Peacock plan and wait for it to expire at the end of the current billing cycle. Once you cancel your subscription, you can proceed with signing up for Peacock through DIRECTV at a discounted price. You must cancel Peacock using the original method used to subscribe. For example, if you subscribed through the Apple App Store, you must cancel your subscription there. You can still use the same Peacock account; you just need to wait for your current subscription to expire first.

steps.title: Sign into the DIRECTV website.
steps.content: Sign into the DIRECTV website . You'll need your DIRECTV user ID and password. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select TV Package.
steps.content: Select TV Package . You can find this underneath My TV service .

steps.title: Select Add.
steps.content: Select Add . If you want to change your DIRECTV package entirely, you can select Switch instead.

steps.title: Search for Peacock.
steps.content: Search for Peacock . This will be labeled as an add-on. If needed, use the search bar to enter your search. If you don't see Peacock Premium at a discounted price, then that means the discounted offer isn't currently available to you. However, you can still sign up for Peacock Premium through DIRECTV to keep your billing together.

steps.title: Select Submit.
steps.content: Select Submit . This will submit your changes. Keep in mind that your updated add-ons and pricing won't take effect until your next billing period. Peacock Premium charges will be added to your regular DIRECTV bill.

steps.title: Check your email for activation.
steps.content: Check your email for activation. Once you've signed up for Peacock through DIRECTV, you'll receive an activation email. Click that email to activate your account.

steps.title: Start watching Peacock.
steps.content: Start watching Peacock. If you're still on the DIRECTV website, you can navigate to your TV Package settings and click Watch now on the Peacock tile to be redirected to the website. You can also download the Peacock app on your TV, phone, or tablet. You can also go directly to the Peacock website to start watching.

steps.title: Does DIRECTV have Peacock?
steps.content: Does DIRECTV have Peacock? You can subscribe to Peacock Premium through your DIRECTV account. Once subscribed, you can easily add the Peacock app to your TV, phone, or tablet and watch there. You can also watch Peacock in a desktop web browser.

steps.title: Is Peacock free with DIRECTV?
steps.content: Is Peacock free with DIRECTV? If you have DIRECTV, you may be eligible for a discounted Peacock Premium subscription.

steps.title: How can I sign up for a Peacock account through DIRECTV?
steps.content: How can I sign up for a Peacock account through DIRECTV? To sign up for Peacock through DIRECTV, you'll need to log into your DIRECTV account on the website, go to your TV Package details, and then look for the Peacock add-on.

steps.title: What channel is Peacock on DIRECTV?
steps.content: What channel is Peacock on DIRECTV? Peacock is a streaming app, not a channel. You won't be able to find Peacock using DIRECTV regular channels, but you can download the app on your TV or mobile device, or watch in a desktop web browser.

steps.title: How do I watch Peacock on DIRECTV?
steps.content: How do I watch Peacock on DIRECTV? To watch Peacock on DIRECTV, you'll need to subscribe and download the app. You can download and use the app on your TV, phone, tablet, or computer.

steps.title: How am I billed for Peacock through DIRECTV?
steps.content: How am I billed for Peacock through DIRECTV? When you add Peacock as an add-on to your DIRECTV plan, it will be added to your regular DIRECTV bill.

steps.title: How do I cancel Peacock?
steps.content: How do I cancel Peacock? If you subscribed to Peacock Premium through DIRECTV, you must return to your DIRECTV account settings, select your TV package settings, and then remove the Peacock add-on. Peacock Premium will be removed immediately. In some cases, you may receive credit on your next bill for an early cancellation.

steps.title: What other add-ons are available through DIRECTV?
steps.content: What other add-ons are available through DIRECTV? For a complete and current list of premium add-ons, you can visit the DIRECTV website .

steps.title: How can I contact DIRECTV?
steps.content: How can I contact DIRECTV? If you receive DIRECTV through your community, you can contact customer support by calling 866-428-1702. If you receive DIRECTV as a courtesy service, you can contact customer support by calling 866-523-0045.
